dzlta.configuration.title: Lighter Than Air Configs
advancements.dzlta.root.title: Lighter Than Air
advancements.dzlta.get_weather_vane.titl: Which Way Does the Wind Blow?
advancements.dzlta.get_weather_vane.desc: Craft a Weather Vane to read the wind's direction
gamerule.windEnabled.description: Enables or disables the wind mechanics.
gamerule.windLockDirection.description: Locks the current wind direction, preventing it from changing.
gamerule.windMinDurationTicks.descriptio: The minimum time (in seconds) before the wind direction changes.
gamerule.windRandomDurationTicks.descrip: Maximum random time (in seconds) added to the base interval for wind changes.
gamerule.windChaoticStorms.description: If enabled, wind changes direction much more frequently during thunderstorms.
